import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' const VDOM_crud = () => { const FNAME = useRef() const LNAME = useRef() const [data, setdata] = useState([]) const [view, setview] = useState({}) const submit_fn = () => { const input = { FNAME: FNAME.current.value, LNAME: LNAME.current.value, } setdata([...data, input]) } const delete_fn = (ind) => { data.splice(ind, 1) setdata([...data]) } return ( <>
{ data?.map((val, ind) => { return ( <>

{val.FNAME}

{val.LNAME}

{/* */} ) }) }
{/* MODAL */}
Modal title
setview({ ...view, FNAME: e.target.value })} value={view.FNAME} />
setview({ ...view, LNAME: e.target.value })} value={view.LNAME} />
) } export default VDOM_crud
